text: @Nigel_Farage Are you out of quarantine already, after your ill-judged trip to the US to support Trump??? Despite the dismally low attendance quite a LOT of people tested positive after that. I hope you are not spreading Covid-19 as you hwoah-hwoah and quaff beer
